CustomField.formula: CASE( Product_Name__c, "Eyeota Audience Data Usage", "SGEY0525000001", "Eyeota Audience Data License", "SGEY0525000002", "Eyeota Revenue Share", "SGEY0525000003", "NetWise Rev Share", "SGNW0525000001", "NetWise ID Graph", "SGNW0525000002", "NetWise ID Graph+", "SGNW0525000003", "NetWise Platform License", "SGNW0525000004", "Consumer Intelligence", "SGNW0525000005", NULL )
